Uses of Package
edu.washington.cs.dm.jeremyc.netflix

Classes in edu.washington.cs.dm.jeremyc.netflix used by edu.washington.cs.dm.jeremyc.netflix
Correlation
          A simple container for a co-occurence count, rating, entity type and entity IDs.
Correlation.TopCorrelators
          An ordered set of Correlations.
Correlation.WeightSort
          This is used to order the Correlations according to "nearness"
EntityType
          We make use of the duality of movie and user, and where logic is usable in both contexts, we use this enum to indicate which one we're using.
MemStore
          The in-memory store of the training data.
MemStore.Rating
          An ID rating pair.
MemStore.Ratings
          A simple wrapper around List<Rating> that caches the average of the rating values, and provides an init() method, called after the list is filled, to ensure the Rating list is sorted by ID and the average computed.
NNPredictor
          The basic implementation of nearest neighbor predictor, where either N nearest users or N nearest movies may be used for calculating predicted ratings.
Populator.DataRow
          A simple container for a movieId, userId, rating triple.
Predictor
          The base class for all predictor implementations.
PredictorTester.PredictorHarness
          A simple container class.
